## R Markdown

### Create argument list using the example in the documentation
```{r, cache=TRUE}
argL <- list(
  ieegts = pt01Epoch[9001:12000, ],
  t_window = 250,
  t_step = 125,
  lambda = NULL,
  nSearch = 100
)
```

### Measure time it takes "**calc_adj_frag**" (old) to complete
```{r, cache=TRUE}
system.time({ 
  fragOld <- do.call(calc_adj_frag, argL) 
})
```

### Measure time it takes "**GetAdjFrag**" (new) to complete
```{r, cache=TRUE}
system.time({ 
  fragNew <- do.call(GetAdjFrag, argL) 
})
```

### Compare output
```{r}
print(fragOld)
print(fragNew)
```
